Text.val: Author : Asaf Kehati
Creation date : 13.10.2006
in order to get the same rsult if the program runs under windows or under I5,
the format in the I/O is set to 'None' and at the end of every line in the form
the - CHR(13) & CHR(10) string was added.
15.11.2012 AS SCR#17691 fixed form output with expressions where attribute was ANSI instead of Unicode
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
29.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended INVO_INVOICENO formatting to alpha 20
on output form still 10 characters are written
16.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
06.06.2008 GB SCR13713 Changed filename
20.03.2007 AK SCR12370 change GNRD from 82 to 85
20.10.2006 AK SCR11974 change extension of output file from .DAT to .TXT
18.10.2006 AK SCR11974 change formatting according to changes in spec
17.10.2006 AK SCR11974 change formatting according to changes in spec
16.10.2006 AK SCR11974 set format to 'None' in I/O in 'run on invoices' and
added chr13 +10 in the end of every line)
replace ' ; ' with ',' in the e-mail address list
GET SYS TEMP PATH
Switch system language to GB laguage , in which report has to be produced
add file name to path
Switch back to user laguage

STP.TXT: M I S S I N G P A R A M E T E R / S :
GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 85) I S E M P T Y

Text.val: CTRL+H for extra SQL range
add leading zeroes (if CLNT306_CLNTDEBTNO_NUMERIC='Y')
as it is (if CLNT306_CLNTDEBTNO_NUMERIC<>'Y')
add leading zeroes (if INVO_INVOICENO contains numeric value)
as it is (if INVO_INVOICENO contains numeric value)
